body_html:
while this is a "nice to have", it's not popular enough that we want to complicate the function even more in it's implementation.
You can do some pre-processing on your targets to get to the same place, or as you mentioned, use the weight=0 trick. In fact, weight is provided for this precise reason.
body_text:
while this is a "nice to have", it's not popular enough that we want to complicate the function even more in it's implementation.
You can do some pre-processing on your targets to get to the same place, or as you mentioned, use the weight=0 trick. In fact, weight is provided for this precise reason.
body:
while this is a "nice to have", it's not popular enough that we want to complicate the function even more in it's implementation.
You can do some pre-processing on your `targets` to get to the same place, or as you mentioned, use the weight=0 trick. In fact, `weight` is provided for this precise reason.
